column4: anyone have experiance with gdm, specifically how to get a user list into it and how to get the userlist to show users?
ya, I do. you want a list of possible users, and pictures for their faces instead the question marks?
pictures I don't care about, but a list of possible users I want
does the standard greater have the browser?
I tried graphical greeter and some themes do have browser but it has no users in it
it's called gdmlogin
in any case I don't really care which one I use as long as there's a user list with _actual_ users
I tried both gdmlogin and gdmgreeter
Greeter= parameter in gdm.conf
you played with that already?
yeah, kinda, but can't get a user list at all in gdmlogin and in gdmgreeter the themes with userlist just bring up an empty list
did you back up the initial file?
I've not erased anything, just comented out what was there, so I kinda have the original
well, what I would do, is restore the original. Then, I would set up the graphical greeter to happy gnome with browser, and that would give me what I understand you want./
I can set up "happy gnome with browser" but the browser list is empty
if I allow all users on the system to be there then it only finds two system users
it doesn't find any users above uid1000
well, that is strange. its just worked here before.
and everyone in #gnome on irc.gnome.org is sleeping
any advice?
no, not really...
know any place that I can get advice from?
